name: Penguin - MacBook Pro sleeve - MADE TO ORDER
description: Turnaround and shipping This item is MADE TO ORDER. Please allow approximately 1-2 weeks for your order to be prepared for shipment. Transit time is approximatively 4-10 working days to USA, 2-7 working days to Canada and 7-14 working days for international destinations. See my shop policies for more details. *** I use 3mm designer felt which is 100% wool to make this MacBook Pro sleeve. It is available for regular MacBook Pro or MacBook Pro with RETINA display, 13" and 15". The flap is attached with a metal button and the eyes are made with 100% wool felt. Swarovski rhinestones add sparkles in the eyes. There is a useful pocket at the front of the sleeve to carry small accessories. The sleeve is lined with orange cotton. You have the option of getting the sleeve with D-rings and a stap that allow you to transform it into a small messenger bag or to get it without D-rings and strap to use it only as a sleeve. Designer felt is perfect to protect your laptop since it is shock absorbant and water repellent. Measurements (exterior) Regular MacBook Pro 13" - Height: 13.5” / 35cm - Width: 9.75” / 25cm - Depth: 1.6 " / 4cm MacBook Pro with RETINA display 13" - Height: 13” / 33cm - Width: 9.5” / 24cm - Depth: 1.4 " / 3.5cm Regular MacBook Pro 15" - Height: 15.5” / 39cm - Width: 9.75” / 25cm - Depth: 1.6 " / 4cm MacBook Pro with RETINA display 15" - Height: 15” / 38cm - Width: 9.5” / 24cm - Depth: 1.4 " / 3.5cm Care instructions Spot clean.

name: Wolf case for iPad, iPad Air and iPad Mini - Natural gray felt
description: Turnaround and shipping This item is MADE TO ORDER. Please allow approximately 1-2 weeks for your order to be prepared for shipment. Transit time is approximatively 4-10 working days to USA, 2-7 working days to Canada and 7-14 working days for international destinations. See my shop policies for more details. *** I use 3mm natural grey designer felt (100% wool) to make this wolf iPad sleeve. The flap is attached with a metal button and details are made with 100% wool felt. The Swarovski rhinestones add sparkles in the eyes. You can find a useful pocket at the front of the sleeve to carry small accessories. The sleeve is lined with soft black poly-cotton. You have the option of getting the sleeve with D-rings and a stap so you can wear in on your shoulder or crossbody or to get it without D-rings and strap. Design wool felt is an eco-friendly, sustainable and renewable material and it is perfect to protect your iPad since it is shock absorbent and water repellent. Felt thickness is 3mm or 1/8 inch. Outside dimensions ** iPad 1/2/3/4 ** Height: 12” / 30cm Width: 9” / 23cm ** iPad Air ** Height: 12” / 30cm Width: 8” / 23cm ** iPad Mini ** Height: 9.25” / 23.5cm Width: 6.75” / 17cm Strap length: from 30" / 75cm to 50" / 127cm Care instructions Spot clean.

There is a useful pocket at the front of the sleeve to carry small things like a credit card, money or tickets. The sleeve is lined with soft black cotton. You have the option of getting the sleeve with D-rings and a stap that allow you to transform it into a small messenger bag or to get it without D-rings and strap to use it only as a sleeve.
